Address.value: 3710-33RD STREET NW SUITE 4000, CALGARY, Alberta, T2L 2M1, Canada

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: XORTX Therapeutics Inc is a clinical-stage biotechnology company. The company focused on developing drug therapies for orphan diseases like polycystic kidney disease, and treatment of health consequences caused by chronic high serum uric acid which include cardiovascular disease and diabetes.
